cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to an invalid hex format (0xZZZ) will cause invalid gNB identification and cell setup failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid MIMO configuration and transmission issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的 MIMO 配置，並造成傳輸問題。
